attributes.action: Make oil companies to show oil price in British Pounds, not in US Dollars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The oil and petrol production companies MUST show a price they pay for Oil in British Pounds and not in US Dollars. 

As the price of the Dollar has drasticaly fallen against the Pound, the increase in oil price is not really influencing how much companies like BP and Shell are really paying for Oil. 

As we pay for petrol in Pounds, that is the currency they should use in all the pricing they give us.

For example:

Allowing for the Dollar fluctuation against the Pound any increase in Oil price would be ofset by the strength of the Pound.

$100 per barrel roughly = £50 per barrel. Which is not that much different from what they payed in the previous years.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
